requiredDocuments.groupTitle: Addendum A - Other Business Ownership/Management (click to download)
Addendum B - SBA Economic Inquiry Disaster Loan (click to download)

bullets.text: Your four most recent quarterly filings of IRS Form 941
Your most recent annual filing of IRS Form 940
Note: it is expected that the Small Business Administration is creating an abbreviated version of this document but having this populated will expedite your readiness

requiredDocuments.groupTitle: Evidence of the Name & Address of Your Business

bullets.text: A recent utility, cable, telephone bill, or an office lease should suffice

requiredDocuments.groupTitle: Two Most Recent Federal Tax Returns

bullets.text: Form 1120 (business tax return) if you are a corporation or limited liability company
Form 1065 (business tax return) if you are a partnership
Form 1040 Schedule C if you are a sole proprietor or independent contractor
All 1099s you have received for the last year
In lieu of tax returns, some lenders may request a 4506-T which allows them to order your tax transcripts directly from the IRS
Articles of Incorporation, LLC operating agreement, or a partnership agreement
Your most recent annual filing of IRS Form 940
